About Us:Firstsource Solutions Limited is a global business process management (BPM) company headquartered in Mumbai, India. Established in 2001, it operates as a subsidiary of the RP-Sanjiv Goenka Group. The company offers a range of services, including contact centers, back-office operations, platform solutions, automation, and analytics, catering to sectors such as banking and financial services, healthcare, communications, media and technology, and diversified industries.Job Title: Engineering Expert / SpecialistLocation: RemoteJob Summary:We are seeking an Engineering Expert with a solid academic background in engineering and significant hands-on experience. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of engineering principles and a strong ability to apply them to real-world challenges. You will be responsible for overseeing, designing, and optimizing engineering solutions while collaborating with a team of talented professionals to meet project objectives and timelines.Key Responsibility:Lead and manage engineering projects from conception through to completion.Design and develop innovative engineering solutions and systems that meet client specifications and regulatory requirement.Analyze and optimize current systems, processes, and designs for better efficiency and performance.Qualification:Bachelor’s degree or higher in Engineering (Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, Chemical, or a related field.Proven experience in an engineering role, with a strong track record of successfully leading and executing engineering project.Excellent knowledge of engineering principles, practices, and techniqueStrong problem-solving skills with the ability to think critically and innovatively.Preferred Skills:Master’s degree or higher in Engineering or a related field.Experience with project management tools and methodologies.Knowledge of industry-specific regulations and standards.Pay:We offer competitive pay, above industry standards, with timely and smooth payments.
Disclaimer:This application is for a limited tenure project-based role and should not be construed as a promise for a full-time or long-term contract role.
